My Expirience

  • May 2019 - present:

    Content Editor - Isobar Poland

    As a Content Editor at Isobar I had the opportunity to work on variety of websites published through the Shopify, and Umbraco CMS. Due to high demand for front-end work on this project I am able to support the team with my programming skills.

    • Copywriting and content editing on multiple websites.
    • Performing quality checks for other Content Editors on the project.
    • Basic front-end development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).
    • Working on various tasks under time constrains.

  • November 2018 - May 2019

    Social Media Manager / Content Manager - Quality Life sp. z o.o.

    In Quality Life I have been managing Social Media platforms (Facebook and Instagram) as well as online shop platform - Sellingo.

    • Answering to clients via Facebook and Instagram.
    • Creating and publishing content in Social Media.
    • Managing promotions and content on the online store.
    • Publishing articles.

  • 2017

    Junior Office Manager - Polish Yachting Association (Polski Związek Żeglarski)

    I have been working in Sports License Department of PYA as a Junior Office Manager. While working there I have been processing and archiving documents containing sensitive data.

    • Managing internal record systems.
    • Archiving documents.
    • Verifying license applications.
    • Writing official letters to applicants.
    • Providing advanced and varying administrative support to guests and colleagues.
